summary: This mod adds Dunwulf Wintersbreath, a Nord Ice Mage to the Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Dunwulf Wintersebreath, Nord Ice Mage[/size][/color][/font]



[font=Times New Roman][size=4][color=#ffffff]This mod adds Dunwulf Wintersbreath, a Nord Ice Mage to Skyrim. You can find him waiting for you at the Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.

He comes  equipped with his own unique Stahlrim/Deathbrand Armor, and a frost-enchanted glass dagger and several frost-spells (including Freeze in 1.2) as well as a Frost Atronach spell, some restoration spells and two alteration spells (Ironflesh & Ebonyflesh).

[/color][/size][/font][i][size=4]1.3 UPDATE Dunwulf is now completely standalone (aside from the requisite DLC), and the files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][font=Times New Roman][size=4]
[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Housecarl for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Steward for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps) [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Big Thanks to [/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies & Stealthic[/url]﻿ for KS Hairdo's Renewal [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang

files.name: Dunwulf Nord Ice Mage
files.changelogHtml:
Added restoration spells
Added wards
Added flesh spells
